title: 史泰龍：《Rocky 4》將推出 Director's Cut 新片名：Rocky vs Drago

replies.msg:
Stallone shared the movie's title in a recent Instagram post alongside a brief teaser of a new full-length documentary, titled 'Keep Punching: The Present Meets the Past,' that will accompany the director's cut of Rocky 4, offering fans insight into the behind-the-scenes process of re-editing the movie.

Stallone indicated in a follow-up Instagram post there would be more footage of their final face-off match as he promised "major payback" for Drago in the new release.

Paulie's robot will be scrapped from the director's cut entirely, with Stallone telling a fan that "the robot is going to the junkyard forever." In the 1985 film, Rocky's brother-in-law Paulie received the six-foot robot as an unexpected gift on his birthday, to which he humorously responded that he wanted a sports car, "not no walking trash can."
